title: 12.Angry.Men.1957.Bluray.1080p.DTS-HD-1.0.x264-Grym
description:
12.Angry.Men.1957.Bluray.1080p.DTS-HD-1.0.x264-Grym.mkv


A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.                


Director..........:  Sidney Lumet    

Writer............:  Reginald Rose           

Starring..........:  Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam   


iMDB URL..........:  http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0050083
SOURCE TYPE.......:  Retail Blu-Ray 21,4 GB Movie @ 29953 kbps / Remux
ViDEO SPECS.......:  x264 2PASS @ 14000+ Kbps (  ) - 23,976 fps

MOViE CROPPED.....:  No
FiLM ASPECT RATiO.:  1.66:1

SUBTiTLES.........:  English, French, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, Danish,

                     Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Polish  
SUBTiTLES EXTRAS..:  Sorry no Subtitles on Disc


NOTE: For video the German BD edition was used. It's the same transfer as used

      For audio was used the Criterion BD's LPCM 1.0 1152 kbps 48 kHz 24 bit audio,
      which were converted to LossLess DTS-HD Master audio.

      Enjoy this Great classic.
